alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Peninsula and Selawik Valley; Chukchi Sea Coast; Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills; Southern Seward Peninsula Coast; St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast; Yukon Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 24 at 3:27PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...ELEVATED WATER ALONG COAST SATURDAY THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... Water will be pushed up onto ice due to strong southwesterly flow across the Bering Sea. Water will rise up through cracks in the sea ice and be pushed up on to the ice along the coast from the Yukon Delta to Point Hope through Monday morning. Elevated water levels are expected to occur between Saturday through Monday morning. Residents living along the coast are encouraged to monitor conditions before venturing out on the sea ice. For the latest forecast, go to weather.gov/fairbanks.
